snippet.title: Dragon Ball Z : Attack of the Saiyans - Trailer - Nintendo DS
snippet.description:
Dragon Ball Z: Attack of the Saiyans brings you the opportunity to discover, enjoy and play the Dragon Ball Z legend in a unique RPG on NDS.

The game follows the Saiyan Saga of the original Dragon Ball Z story starting from the attack of Saiyans: Vegeta and Nappa, and including 23rd World Wide tournament.  Players will take the role of Goku and travel the DBZ universe from jungle to Snow Mountain on their quest to victory.

Dragon Ball Z: Attack of the Saiyans features a host of original features which will be sure to thrill fans, such as brand new gameplay, unique game modes, fun side quests and content never before seen in either the anime or manga series.

- Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/dbz.videogames
- Website: http://www.dragonball-videogames.com
- Namco Bandai Games: http://www.namcobandaigames.eu
